trans-unit.source: Specifies how the content in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" /> control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal" /> 控制項中的內容如何呈現。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode> enumeration represents the modes that you can specify for how the content in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode>列舉，代表您可以讓您指定的模式中的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>呈現控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A> property uses these enumeration values to set the behavior of the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A>屬性會使用這些列舉值來設定內容的行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you specify `PassThrough`, the entire contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property are passed to the device or browser without any modifications.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`PassThrough`的整個內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性傳遞至裝置或瀏覽器，無須任何修改。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control contains an `<hr>` tag, it is sent to all devices and browsers regardless of whether it is supported.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項包含`<hr>`標記，它會傳送至所有的裝置和瀏覽器，不論是否支援。

trans-unit.source: If you specify `Encode`, the contents for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property are converted into an HTML-encoded string before rendering.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`Encode`，如內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性會轉換成 HTML 編碼字串呈現之前。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control contains an `<hr>` tag, it will be converted to `<hr>` and sent to the device or browser.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>控制項包含`<hr>`標記，它會轉換成`<hr>`並傳送至裝置或瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: If you specify `Transform`, the rendering behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property depends on the type of markup being rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`Transform`的呈現行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性取決於所呈現的標記類型。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal> control is rendered for a device or browser that supports HTML or XHTML, specifying Transform produces the same behavior as specifying PassThrough.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal>裝置要呈現控制項，或瀏覽器支援 HTML 或 XHTML，指定轉換會產生指定傳遞相同的行為。

trans-unit.source: All markup tags and elements for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property are rendered for the requesting browser.
trans-unit.target: 所有標記標籤和項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性會要求瀏覽器的轉譯。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode.PassThrough> control is rendered for a markup language other than HTML or XHTML, such as WML or cHTML, you can use the Transform value to remove unsupported markup elements.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode.PassThrough>要呈現控制項的 HTML 或 XHTML，例如 WML 或 cHTML 標記語言，您可以移除不支援的標記項目使用的轉換值。

trans-unit.source: In this case, any markup-language elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property that are not supported in the targeted markup language are not rendered for the control.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下的任何標記語言項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>中目標的標記語言不支援的屬性不會轉譯控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode.Transform> control contains an `<hr>` tag, the tag is removed before the content is sent to a WML device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LiteralMode.Transform>控制項包含`<hr>`內容傳送至 WML 裝置之前，會移除標記，標記。

trans-unit.source: If an unsupported tag contains content, only the tag is removed and the content is sent to the device or browser.
trans-unit.target: 如果不支援的標記包含的內容，只會將標記會移除，然後將內容傳送至裝置或瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property contains the content `<XYZ>Test</XYZ>`, the `<XYZ>` and `</XYZ>` tags are removed while the text `Test` is sent to the device or browser.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性包含的內容`<XYZ>Test</XYZ>`、`<XYZ>`和`</XYZ>`標記會移除文字`Test`傳送至裝置或瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to set a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A> property is initially set to `Encode` in the declarative syntax for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A>屬性一開始會設定為`Encode`在控制項的宣告式語法。

trans-unit.source: After the page loads, the user can click a button to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A> property to `PassThrough`.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面載入之後，使用者可以按一下按鈕，即可設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Mode%2A>屬性`PassThrough`。

trans-unit.source: This causes the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A> property to render differently.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致的內容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Literal.Text%2A>屬性以不同的方式呈現。

trans-unit.source: The literal control's contents are HTML-encoded.
trans-unit.target: 常值控制項的內容是 HTML 編碼。

trans-unit.source: The literal control's contents are not modified.
trans-unit.target: 常值控制項的內容並未修改。

trans-unit.source: The literal control's unsupported markup-language elements are removed.
trans-unit.target: 常值控制項的不支援標記語言項目已移除。

trans-unit.source: If the literal control is rendered on a browser that supports HTML or XHTML, the control's contents are not modified.
trans-unit.target: 如果常值控制項要呈現在支援 HTML 或 XHTML 的瀏覽器上，控制項的內容就不會加以修改。
